title: Прєподи
overview: Not so long ago, Elvira, Daryna, Yuliia, Mykola and Yulik matched couples, fell in love, buzzed all night, preparing for exams, and invented nicknames for the teachers. And today we found ourselves behind the chair. Therefore, it is difficult for them to pretend to be wealthy in front of students, it is even more difficult to be serious with senior colleagues, and it is completely impossible to avoid comical situations while maneuvering between two shores.
